Type.BattleDialog: Focus, both of you. We don’t have much time.
No time for chats, brace yourselves for combat.
I know you’re starting to get exhausted, so we’ll quickly handle this and return.
We have much to report when we get back, so be quick with retrieving the books.
We’re going to work overtime… Bear with it just for tonight, everyone.
Guess I was the weaker one… How pathetic of me.
We should move on for now. No need to join them in death.
Regain your composure. You’ll be their next target if you waver.
…The worse the situation gets, the harder we must press on.
We’re a step closer to going home.
I’ll end you at a breath.
Rose is telling us to focus. Let’s get ready, newbie.
Let’s clean things up as usual.
Hey, newbie… You’re more relaxed than I expected. I thought you’d get scared.
Do we have to finish cleaning the train when we go back? Man, I’m sooo tired…
Jobs like this are simple for us. It’s what we always do.
Dammit… I knew this was a bad idea…
It’s unfortunate… But there’s no point making a big deal out of it.
Shouldn’t let sadness get the best of me. I have to be calm right now.
So much for an Urban Nightmare, eh…
Easy peasy lemon squeezy. I’ve fought passengers tougher than you.
That felt easier than those ascetic passengers, actually?
Whoa, this looks way bigger than what I saw outside?!
There were people looking as strong as those guys in the train?
We’re gonna go eat gopchang-jeongol together after we get this done, right?
We could easily handle it thanks to my reliable seniors~
We’ll take this book… That one, too… Shall we head back now?
I only just started a new life…
I have to overcome things like this, too… But… th-that was my senior…
I thought I was getting used to it…
Hmhmhm~ It’s what I’ve been doing every day!
This is easy as pie for me!
The people here are pretty tough… That was close.
Is this overtime work? I need a break, please…
And we just finished handling those heaps of meat… Man, I’m dead tired…
Let’s work, y’all! We’ve got orders, and our job is to follow ‘em.
Not as bad as those flesh globs, I guess?
Those things were disgusting, true… Not as disgusting as extra work, though.
We don’t have a choice. It’s work we’re supposed to do, so don’t grunt about it.
Looks like the sitch is all cleaned up… We can go home now, right?
Phew, crisis averted… W Corp. isn’t going down today…
Imagine if an outsider got their hands on this book.
I was so close to losing my job… At least we managed to retrieve the books before anyone else did.
What kind of Singularity can make books like this outta people?
If I fail this… The secret of W Corp…
I don’t wanna die… I just got into the Nest and became an agent…
We have to… stop the secret from leaking…
I followed the manual… All the time… That’s all I did…
…We’ve got to hang tight.
This is a horrible job… I want to quit as soon as I can…
Always happens to us agents.
I lost a couple of coworkers today, but… It still stings bad.
Cleaning the train, extra work like this… It’s all the same.
Much simpler than the monsters we had to deal with earlier.
It’s easy if you think of them as train passengers.
That’s what happens when people die here… I gotta stay sharp.
